page.title: 11SURVEY 1 FAMILIES & HOMES
page.content: A survey of 35 families with children aged 7-10 yrs. and reflecting life in 1985.(SURVEY FROM SQUARE 5,UTILITIES) {Families.}60% have 2 adults & 2children The rest 1, 3 or 4 children 40% have a divorcee within the family 50% of Parents were born in London 25% in Hertford. 55% of families have relatives abroad.The greatest % have lived in Hertford for 7 years. 18% originate in London The survey shows a wide range of British origins and some from Commonwealth countries.33% had an eldest member over 70 yrs.33% over 80 6% over 90. 94% of those answering did not have false teeth.66% of parents were in their 30s. 33% in their 40s . {Homes.}Houses ;- built before 1940 13% 40-50 17%; 50-60 17%; 60-70 37%; 70-80 17%. Rooms:6 16%; 7 13%; 8 32%; 9 19%; 11 13%.Bedrooms: 1 3%; 2 6%; 3 59%; 4 26%; 5 6%.45% of houses had fireplaces
